channel.title: CVE Feed for ByteDance K.K. -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ByteDance K.K. -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-41797|2024-08-03T12:56:38.319Z -- bytedance%20k.k. -- lemon8%20app%20for%20android%20and%20lemon8%20app%20for%20ios
item.description: Improper authorization in handler for custom URL scheme vulnerability in Lemon8 App for Android versions prior to 3.3.5 and Lemon8 App for iOS versions prior to 3.3.5 allows a remote attacker to lead a user to access an arbitrary website via the vulnerable App. As a result, the user may become a victim of a phishing attack.
